Name: Britons
History: The Britons were the Celtic tribes of the British Isles. Using chariots, longswordsmen and powerful melee soldiers, they staged fearesome revolts against Rome to protect their customs and interests. Also, they built thousands of unique structures such as hill forts, crannogs and brochs.

Factions.Name: Britons
Factions.Description: The Celts of the British Isles.

Technologies.Name: - Swift Chariots
Technologies.Description: Celtic Chariots attack and move 10% faster.

Heroes.Name: - Celtic Chariot
Heroes.Description: Ranged chariot cavalry. Good against melee units.

Heroes.Name: - Druid
Heroes.Description: Stronger replacement for the generic Priest.

CivBonuses.Name: - Start with a Dog Scout
CivBonuses.Description: Which is better at scouting but weaker in combat.

CivBonuses.Name: - Structures
CivBonuses.Description: build 20% faster, have 20% less hit points.

TeamBonuses.Name: - Cargo Ships
TeamBonuses.Description: have 20% more hit points (currently not shared).
